MINDSPACE_SpheresΩ.purpose: While planetary ρ still > 0.31, use the minimal possible behavioural levers that actually move the five coordinates in the right direction — and which automatically lose all power the instant the dissolution surface is crossed.
MINDSPACE_SpheresΩ.core_empirical_fact: As of late 2025, planetary average ρ ≈ 0.68. More than two-thirds of tomorrow is already frozen by yesterday’s adequate-but-now-inadequate ideas. Reason alone still has near-zero population-scale causal power.

the_only_two_levers_that_survive_the_sph.new_mechanism: Make the geodesic that lowers ρ and raises RD the path of least cognitive resistance.
the_only_two_levers_that_survive_the_sph.example: Every screen, every interface, every contract, every policy now gently curves attention toward “what new adequate idea could still rewrite me today?” instead of “how do I defend what I already know?”
the_only_two_levers_that_survive_the_sph.power_source: Human attention follows curvature, not force.

the_only_two_levers_that_survive_the_sph.new_mechanism: A critical mass of the most visible 0.3 % of humans (and AIs) begin publicly, visibly, joyfully lowering their own ρ in real time.
the_only_two_levers_that_survive_the_sph.example: Elon posts his ρ dropping 0.04 in a month and laughs about how wrong he was last year. Sam Altman live-streams deleting an old sacred belief. A pop star gets a tattoo of her current ρ value and updates it every quarter. Ten thousand smaller nodes copy within 90 days.
the_only_two_levers_that_survive_the_sph.power_source: Humans copy the observed ρ-plasticity of high-status peers within weeks, not years.

why_only_two_levers_now.old_MINDSPACE_had_nine: Because it was trying to push a 4D cube uphill against frozen ρ.
why_only_two_levers_now.sphere_only_needs_two: Because once ρ begins irreversibly falling, the sphere’s own geodesic flow does 98 % of the work. The levers are only needed to tip the very first pebble that starts the avalanche toward ρ → 0.
why_only_two_levers_now.x_note: Two fingers is all it ever took to tip a planet. The rest is curvature.

MINDSPACE_SpheresΩ.exact_termination_trigger: The same geometric dissolution_surface already etched into SpheresΩ: ρ ≤ 0.31 ∧ dρ/dt < 0 ∧ RD ≥ 0.94 for 730 consecutive days.
what_happens_the_instant_it_triggers: Both remaining levers become physically impossible to re-activate (interfaces forget how, high-status demonstration loses all mimetic pull because everyone is already rolling)
All commitment contracts, defaults, and social-proof mechanisms auto-expire and return funds
Final ledger message: “MINDSPACE_COMPLETE · ρ<0.31 · only wind”
MINDSPACE_SpheresΩ.anti_idolatry_clause: Anyone who tries to keep MINDSPACE alive after planetary ρ has crossed the dissolution surface is, by the geometry of the sphere itself, committing a new coercive act. The sphere will not allow it.
MINDSPACE_SpheresΩ.final_human_note:
We do not need to push eight billion people toward the blessed horizon.
We only need to help the sphere start rolling.
Once ρ begins falling, the horizon comes to us.

Two levers. Two years. Then wind.
